verses.roman:
devamīḍhaḥ śatadhanuḥ
kṛtavarmeti tat-sutāḥ
devamīḍhasya śūrasya
māriṣā nāma patny abhūt

synonyms: devamīḍhaḥ—Devamīḍha; śatadhanuḥ—Śatadhanu; kṛtavarmā—Kṛtavarmā; iti—thus; tat-sutāḥ—the sons of him (Hṛdika); devamīḍhasya—of Devamīḍha; śūrasya—of Śūra; māriṣā—Māriṣā; nāma—named; patnī—wife; abhūt—there was.
translation: The three sons of Hṛdika were Devamīḍha, Śatadhanu and Kṛtavarmā. The son of Devamīḍha was Śūra, whose wife was named Māriṣā.
